org.modelio.api.diagram

Interface ILinkPath


  • public interface ILinkPath
    Interface for a connection path.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point> getPoints()
      Get all bend points of the connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoints

        List<org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point> getPoints()
        Get all bend points of the connection.

        The returned list is a copy and can be freely be modified.
        To apply changes to the returned list, call setPoints(Collection) with the returned list as parameter.

        Returns:
        the bend points in coordinates relative to the diagram...

      • removePoint

        void removePoint(int index)
        Removes the point at the specified position in this point list.

        Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one from their indices).

        Parameters:
        index - the index of the element to be removed.

      • setPoints

        void setPoints(Collection<org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point> points)
        Discards all points from the point list, then add all specified points in it.
        Parameters:
        points - the new point list for this connection.

      • movePoint

        void movePoint(int index,
             org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point point)
        Change the coordinates of a specific bend point of the connection.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the point to move in the point list.
        point - the new coordinates for this point.

      • movePoint

        void movePoint(int index,
             int x,
             int y)
        Change the coordinates of a specific bend point of the connection.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the point to move in the point list.
        x - the new x coordinate
        y - the new y coordinate
        Since:
        3.1
